name: [color=#FF4900]Ajax Chief[/color]
text: [color=#1240AB]Argos[/color], there are [color=#C60000]serious problems[/color]. We’re going to get [color=#FF4900]you out of there[/color], please hold on a few minutes while we [color=#1240AB]arrive at your coordinates[/color]. You have to go back home.

name: [color=#1240AB]Argos[/color]
text: I’m sorry [color=#FF4900]boss[/color], this time I won’t [color=#1240AB]ignore this[/color]. I’m [color=#CD0074]already at home[/color], I already am…
